artist: Engraver: Jacob Houbraken; Painter: After Jan Maurits Quinkhard
description: half length portrait facing viewer; wearing robe, vest. white cravat and long curly white wig
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: [J.M. Quinkhard Pinxit 1738   J. Houbraken Sculpsit/ PETRUS VAN MUSSCHENBROEK, LUGD: BAT:/ PH: ET M:D: PHIL: MATH: ET ASTRON: PROF: IN ACAD: ULTRAJ:/ 6 lines latin: Quisquis scire cupis....gaudet habere suum/ HENR: SNAKENBURG]; in pencil on sheet: [1-564]
title: Portrait of Petrus Van Musschenboek
